title: Cyprus takes the helm at the Council of the EU
summary_full: On January 1st, Cyprus took over the Presidency of the Council of the EU, heralding an important and potentially challenging few months for the Mediterranean member state.
summary_public: On January 1st, Cyprus took over the Presidency of the Council of the EU, heralding an important and potentially challenging few months for the Mediterranean member state.

CY.label: positive
CY.evidence: Cyprus takes the helm at the Council of the EU
